details.title: Test Creation and Maintainment
details.description: Learned how to create automatic tests to ensure complex UI elements worked correctly with an in house framework and Gauge. Taught team how to use

details.title: Goal
details.description: The goal of the project is to make a cloud system that analyzes a live stream of data for 'Paychex, Inc'. The final system will take a variety of different data types from Kafka, a streaming platform, and abstract them to be analyzed using Microsoft Azure, a Microsoft cloud ecosystem.

details.title: Azure
details.description: Worked with many of Azure's technologies such as Azure VMs. Created and managed a VM used to host the Kafka component of the system. The VM was configured with the necessary software and the ability to support many users concurrently.

details.title: Peer Mentor
details.description: Trained our team of five peers how to operate the VM to minimize its costs. In Github, I taught the team how to commit changes and minimize any conflicts that may arise from development.
